headline.main: Friends Throughout the World Hail Chaplin's Genius

abstract: various notables comment on passing of Chaplin; they include Ruth Gordon, Adolph Green, Paulette Goddard, Sophia Loren, Garson Kanin, Arthur Krim, Betty Comden, Bosley Crowther, Agnes de Mille and Brooks Atkinson (S)
snippet: Charles Chaplin's friends in every part of the world hailed him yesterday as the greatest film maker of his time.
